attributes.action: We want our say (a referendum at the next general election)
attributes.additional_details:
The idea is simple. We want a proper democratic say in government decisions.

So, at the next election, we get to vote on a whole series of issues:

Do we want a limit on UK social security benefits and free NHS care for non-nationals
Do we want Trident
Do we want to invest more or less in Defence
Do we want to invest more or less in NHS
Do we want to invest more or less in Schools
Do we want to remain in EU?
Do we want to invest more or less in Nuclear Power Stations
Do we want to invest more or less on Renewable energy
Do we want to continue with the monarchy as head of State?
Do we want to “right to die” (with all proper safeguards) for those terminally ill
